table_description: GitHub Commits bundle project files for download by users.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the commit.

columns.name: sha
columns.description: SHA of the commit.

columns.name: short_sha
columns.description: Short SHA of the commit.

columns.name: message
columns.description: Commit message.

columns.name: author_login
columns.description: The login name of the author of the commit.

columns.name: authored_date
columns.description: Timestamp when the author made this commit.

columns.name: author
columns.description: The commit author.

columns.name: committer_login
columns.description: The login name of the committer.

columns.name: committed_date
columns.description: Timestamp when commit was committed.

columns.name: committer
columns.description: The committer.

columns.name: additions
columns.description: Number of additions in the commit.

columns.name: authored_by_committer
columns.description: Check if the committer and the author match.

columns.name: deletions
columns.description: Number of deletions in the commit.

columns.name: changed_files
columns.description: Count of files changed in the commit.

columns.name: committed_via_web
columns.description: If true, commit was made via GitHub web ui.

columns.name: commit_url
columns.description: URL of the commit.

columns.name: signature
columns.description: The signature of commit.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the commit.

columns.name: tarball_url
columns.description: URL to download a tar of commit.

columns.name: zipball_url
columns.description: URL to download a zip of commit.

columns.name: tree_url
columns.description: URL to tree of the commit.

columns.name: can_subscribe
columns.description: If true, user can subscribe to this commit.

columns.name: subscription
columns.description: Users subscription state of the commit.

columns.name: url
columns.description: URL of the commit.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node ID of the commit.

columns.name: message_headline
columns.description: The Git commit message headline.
